website_summaries.verdict: High-quality markers and charms allow for truly personal wine glasses.
pros: With a number of fun colors to choose from, these markers also come with 4 cork-style charms to further personalize your glasses
Ink dries in roughly 3 to 5 minutes and will wash off with a little warm water and almost no scrubbing
cons: Some of the darker colors are hard to see against a red wine

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a wine party that I recently had and the ladies would be writing their names on their glasses so they each would know who's glass belong to whom. The markers came in cute colors and the ladies loved the idea. They are not permanent which is good and bad because the wine was chilled so after a while their names rubbed off but they did look cute before the chilled wine was poured LOL still I love these pins and will definitely be using them for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These pens are great – especially when you have a lot of people drinking beverages at a party. Each person can write their own name and choose their own color pen to do it. This has been a more effective solution than using wine charms. I am very happy with these, and I think they will last for quite a while before the increments dry.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Marker comes off glass.
customer_reviews.text: The marker comes right off the glass when condensation makes the glass wet. Leaves hands, and all surfaces it touches messy. Spent a long time cleaning up my white, quartz countertops after a party.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for stemless wine glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Since i switched to stemless wine and drinking glasses, there wasn't a cute charm each glass, these are the perfect solution, I put the markers out next to the glasses and it was fun watching everyone trying to out do each other with there names and designs. I will be ordering more, including the silver and gold,just so I have enough around.
customer_reviews.author: MullP

customer_reviews.title: Best way to Mark a wine glass
customer_reviews.text: This is the best way for guests to keep track of their glasses. Cute decorative wine rings are fun but they forget which one they had - a name is hard to forget. I had always bought the more expensive ones but these have been a very nice surprise- they work well. I plan on buying more as hostess gifts.
customer_reviews.author: psb

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought these hoping they'd be as good as others I've used. The colors are not very bright. They also don't wash off easily. I'm going to keep looking for some that are as good as the ones that my local winery uses for their member events.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Berry

customer_reviews.title: Colorful Wine glass markers
customer_reviews.text: These markers, work great. I love the color variety, & they wash off easily. I bought them, after seeing them at a friend’s home. I wS a little dissaponted, that they were not packaged in a nice cylinder container, as hers were.
customer_reviews.author: MJ29

customer_reviews.title: I’m disappointed. One of the markers didn’t even work and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are just ok. For an “amazon choice”, I’m disappointed. One of the markers didn’t even work and the others aren’t even that dark when you use them. Waste of money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Heimbuch

customer_reviews.title: MULTI-USE wine glass markers!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the obvious ... to mark my wine glasses ... but then! I decided to do a little art work on my windows! Traced some great cartoon pictures of some pelicans on the windows facing the lake ... can't wait until our two granddaughters arrive (they're 4) ... so they can leave us some great artwork too! Markers arrived quickly ... recommend this seller!
customer_reviews.author: JRaab

customer_reviews.title: Meh, could write darker
customer_reviews.text: They’re ok. I buy wine markers all the time to use on a daily basis so everyone knows whose glass is whose. These aren’t as dark as other brands. Sweat off if you have ice in your cup more so than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: kba

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: Horrible...anything written on glasses in any color just melted off. Terrible product
customer_reviews.author: CWShops

customer_reviews.title: You can never drink so much you forget your name...
customer_reviews.text: No matter how many glasses you have going (white wine, red wine, cocktail, water), you will always remember which is yours... because it will have YOUR NAME on it. These work great, wash off easily, and the metallic inks are even festive. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Super Cool
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a wine birthday party i was hosting and it was really neat to decorate our wine glasses. It was nice to be able to keep track of whose glass was whose. It brought out the kid in the adults and it something cool for kids to play with as well.
customer_reviews.author: REMO

customer_reviews.title: helps in large gatherings
customer_reviews.text: It works well. It is always hard to keep glasses for people separate during large gathering. This certainly helps
customer_reviews.author: a3d

customer_reviews.title: Easy to tell glasses apart
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for a large wine party! We used real glassware so as each guest arrived we gave them a glass and right away had them personalize it with the markers. It was a great way to keep from mixing up glasses as the night went on.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Fun!! Works well!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item for quickly identifying classes temporarily and adds a bit of fun to it as people can create their own names and designs
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: I liked the round packaging and the nice color variety for ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the round packaging and the nice color variety for a good price. Even though I bought it as a gift, I tried one marker on my wine glass to be sure it was okay before giving. It dried quickly and only started to come off when wet. I'm hoping my niece likes the gift (along with a bottle of wine and a neck/shoulder wrap). I think she will!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to write and wash off
customer_reviews.text: Bought these from my favorite things party and they were a huge hit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wine Glass Markers
customer_reviews.text: I used the markers for guests to sign a wine bottle at my son's wedding rehearsal dinner. Worked great, turned out as a nice momento.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K. Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Crayons
customer_reviews.text: These looked great when initially put on glasses but as soon as you hold glasses the crayon wipes off. This was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Elmo san diego

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t write well
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a gift for someone who hosts parties often, unfortunately they did not work as well as I hoped :(
customer_reviews.author: Ansley

customer_reviews.title: Some markers don’t work...
customer_reviews.text: Both gold markers seem dry and barely write. Others seem okay for now.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for parties.
customer_reviews.text: Used these at my mother’s 60th birthday party. Lots of fun and came off easily in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product there were several choices - I chose this because of the package it was a gift - loved the look and the markers perfect wine bag gift
customer_reviews.author: C. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Variable colored markers for wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: It was a fun activity to go along with wine tasting.the marker did easily wash off so it could be applied again. Bonus wine charms!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Eckerich

customer_reviews.title: Love these markers
customer_reviews.text: Love these markers, the box has a nice variety of colors and i made very cute designs. They washed out with no problem. I gave a set to my boyfriend and I am definitely buying a set for me. Great product
customer_reviews.author: haidy winston

customer_reviews.title: So handy!
customer_reviews.text: So much better (and more fun) than wine charms. The writing comes right off in the dishwasher but doesn’t smudge super easily while using you the glass. These are great!
customer_reviews.author: MPD

customer_reviews.title: Test them
customer_reviews.text: 3 of the colors were dry. Test all of them as soon as you get them. Unfortunately I did not realize it, until I attempted to use them for a party.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Messy if you use ice
customer_reviews.text: They don't mention in the write up that plain water (like glass sweat) will wash off the marker. I purchased these for cold drinks and had to send them back
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The colors are really pretty. I use them on other glasses as well.

customer_reviews.title: No more mixed up glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Great for marking wine glasses or could be used for water glasses also.

customer_reviews.title: Nice storage case
customer_reviews.text: I have not used them at a party yet, but they come in a great storage case, and all the markers seem to be working. I'm looking forward to trying them out on wine glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Aps

customer_reviews.title: Useful markers
customer_reviews.text: These markers are very useful if you do not want to buy disposable cups! I used them for my bd party and they worked great, also it was fun to decorate the cups.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: the dry ink comes right off the glass too easily and make a mess on the hands.

customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift, so I haven’t personally used them, but I was told they work as intended.

customer_reviews.title: Great product

The guests all loved making their own designs and said the markers were the perfect solution and planned to purchase. Thanks for a great product.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for labeling my spice jars that I bought

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Markers have nice opaque ink that rinses off instantly with water. The cork charms are not exceptional, but perfectly functional, and hook easily around the stem of a wine glass or water goblet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They write wonderfully and wipe right off the glass without leaving any ...
customer_reviews.text: The marks and charms were just as they are described in the listing! They write wonderfully and wipe right off the glass without leaving any marks or residue. My friends have loved using them so far! Everyone thinks they are unique and fun!
customer_reviews.author: LC2125

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how they work yet, got them as a Christmas stocking stuffer.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing idea! I do in-home wine tastings and this ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing idea! I do in-home wine tastings and this is the perfect way to identify each person's glass. Plus, it makes for a great game/ice-breaker to have people decorate their glasses. Washes off easily in soapy water - so you're ready to create again later!
customer_reviews.author: Karilena

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: It can be super annoying to lose track of your glass at a party, so I love the way the markers write clearly, as well as the fun colors that come in the pack. It's fun having guests write their own names/nicknames out, too. The 4 wine charms were a nice bonus as well. A lot of wine charms are heavy and I find myself worrying they might break the glass, however these are cork and are super lightweight. Overall, I am extremely pleased with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Lana B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I have a friend who loves to entertain and at the end of the evening there are always two or three times of number of used wine glasses than people. I bought these for her as a gift, problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Pickles

customer_reviews.title: Add more fun to every bottle of wine you share with others
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! I have written on bottles (as a reminder of giver or event) - very easy to read. I have not yet written on glasses, so cannot rate the ease of cleaning ... a key consideration for repeated use.
customer_reviews.author: Katie - NC

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I liked that these came with the cute cork pieces and the markers, which can be a pain to wipe off if you let glasses sit for awhile. I bought them for my mom with uniform wine glasses that get mixed up at every gathering.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Eastridge

customer_reviews.title: Nice item
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice to mark on glasses to identify each person's drink. They do smudge when the glasses get condensation on them so you will want to write above the drink line!
customer_reviews.author: Debbi

customer_reviews.title: It’s magic!
customer_reviews.text: These markers are pretty cool. They write well, dry quick with no smudge. Also it washes right off when you’re done. It’s magic! I highly recommend these for gatherings, because it’s fun and there’s no mixing of glasses.
customer_reviews.author: kimzue

customer_reviews.title: I lreally liked that these markers came with nice packaging

customer_reviews.title: One Star

product_meta.title: Wine Glass Markers, Pack of 7 By Vaci + 4 Wine Glass Charms, Metallic Color Pens Drink Markers, Personalize your Drink, Washable Wine Accessories Gift
feature_bullets: NEVER LOOSE YOUR DRINK AGAIN - Personalize your wine glasses with this Drink markers set of 7 Metallic colors and extra 4 Wine glass Charms will make sure your guest will Never lose track of their drink and for sure, will bring a smile on your their faces.

MAKE EVERY OCCASION MEMORABLE - Be The perfect Host and make your mark, Let guests tag thire names or to Add a personal touch to thire bottles and glassware. This washable and non-toxic erasable set will allow you to add personal note for your guest, write a funny message or to draw a cute picture

GREAT FOR SO MANY USES - Pack includes red, purple, blue, green, silver and 2X Gold pens AND extra 4 inspirational glass charms, can Customize a multitude of surfaces and work on many other surfaces, including glass, mirrors, ceramics, windows and more!, use in party, barbecue, wedding/baby shower, or anytime people are gathering !

UNIQUE ROUND GIFT BOX - This Gift Set is perfect gifting idea for friends, families and wine connoisseurs. give it as party favor or as gift for your kids' in order to foster their imagination by letting them draw on the windows or glasses!

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - we LOVE our customer and TRUST our products so if for some reason you are not happy with your new baby pacifier clips, you can return them for a full refund no questions asked, so Order yours today!
